item.description:
It's been to long since both groups met so..! I know it's a last min ride but this is what's going on tonight and my group is going to be there with 18 (+) bikes. thought it would be great to let you guys know so you guys can join us (Boston Tier 1 Riders).

 

An explosive combination of bikes, beer, babes, burgers, bikinis and DJs awaits you at the Saints & Sinners Lounge (formerly called Red Room). This is a weekly bike night that occurs every Wednesday throughout summer. On most nights they have contests like wet t-shirt, best bikini girl etc. Cash prizes awarded to 1st and second place! Doors open at 8p!

 

 

This week, Infamous Entertainment along with Hi Society Promotions rocked the party with models, bikini contest on the pole, music & a whole lot more!! See what everyone is buzzing about - the event that had over 3,000 attendees last summer!

Google maps route

We'll ride down to O'Rourkes pub, 23 Peck Lane Warwick, RI  for dinner and meet Joe there. After the dinner, we can head to the lounge. We plan to head back from the lounge between 10.30 and 11pm.
item.name: Bike Night @ Saints & Sinners Lounge (Red Room/ join ride w/ Tier 1 riders)
